bibl.title: Excavations at Tell el-Balamun 1991-1994.
bibl.note: 4 figg. et 4 pll. coul., 92 pll. n./bl. et 2 plans dépl.
The first four seasons of excavations carried out by the British Museum at Tell el-Balamun in the north-eastern Nile Delta. - Pp. 67-74: Ptolemaic Settlement; - 75-87: Catalogue of Finds.
SPENCER A.J., Excavations at Tell el-Balamun 1991-1994.
London, British Museum Press, 1996, 4°, 100 pp., 4 figg. et 4 pll. coul., 92 pll. n./bl. et 2 plans dépl. ISBN 0-7141-0991-6. £50.
